text.speaker: STRANGE DOC
text.text: Miss Lucy said here was someone out cold? May I be of service?

text.speaker: story
text.text: Without waiting for an answer ore further examination he kneels next to you and gives you a shot right into your neck, even thru the mist of alcohol you fell the sting.

text.speaker: STRANGE DOC
text.text: So this should bring you up and about.

text.speaker: story
text.text: While he leaves, you really feel your head cleaning, but as soon as the clouds are fading away, the question about what he did just injected to your blood takes over your mind.
